summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Fight Judge AI supervisor and operator workflows. All 6 requested features tested and passed (100% success rate).

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement needed

action_items: Minor: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent components for accessibility compliance
critical_code_review_comments: SupervisorControl.jsx: Well-structured event and fight creation flow with proper localStorage persistence
OperatorSimple.jsx: Correctly displays simplified striking buttons (Jab, Cross, Hook, etc.) WITHOUT 'SS' prefix as required
SupervisorDashboardPro.jsx: Comprehensive dashboard with real-time delta scoring, round tracking, and operator management
Event logging works correctly with toast notifications and event count tracking
All API integrations working properly with the backend
seed_data_creation: Test events created: 'Test Event PFC 99', 'Test Event PFC 100', 'Test Event PFC 101'. Test fights created: 'Jon Jones vs Stipe Miocic', 'Conor McGregor vs Khabib Nurmagomedov'
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend flows tested and working: (1) SupervisorControl /control page - event creation with localStorage persistence, (2) Add Fight dialog with Red/Blue corner inputs, weight class, rounds selection, (3) Start Fight flow activates fight and shows operator URLs, (4) OperatorSimple /op/{boutId} shows simplified striking buttons (Jab, Cross, Hook, Uppercut, Elbow, Knee, Kick) WITHOUT 'SS' prefix, (5) Event logging with toast notifications and event count tracking, (6) SupervisorDashboardPro /supervisor/{boutId} displays fight info, delta scores, round tracking, and operator management.
passed_tests: TEST 1: SupervisorControl page (/control) - Create Event flow - PASSED
TEST 2: SupervisorControl page - Add Fight flow (Red Corner, Blue Corner, Weight Class, Rounds) - PASSED
TEST 3: SupervisorControl page - Start Fight (fight becomes Active, shows operator URLs) - PASSED
TEST 4: OperatorSimple page (/op/{boutId}) - Simplified striking buttons display correctly (NO 'SS' prefix) - PASSED
TEST 5: OperatorSimple page - Event logging with toast notification - PASSED
TEST 6: SupervisorDashboardPro page (/supervisor/{boutId}) - Loads and displays fight info - PASSED
